commit.message:
except.c (can_throw): Use INTVAL on a CONST_INT.

        * except.c (can_throw): Use INTVAL on a CONST_INT.
        (reachable_handlers): Likewise.
        * flow.c (count_basic_blocks, find_basic_blocks_1): Likewise.

From-SVN: r32471

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,9 @@
+2000-03-10  Richard Henderson  <rth@cygnus.com>
+
+	* except.c (can_throw): Use INTVAL on a CONST_INT.
+	(reachable_handlers): Likewise.
+	* flow.c (count_basic_blocks, find_basic_blocks_1): Likewise.
+
